Fitting and Gaussian Process – Fitting packages¶

Gaussian Process¶

fit_gp(x_data, y_data[, yerr_data, filters])

Fits data with gaussian process.

Model Fitters¶

fit_model(x_data, y_data, yerr_data[, filters])

Fits data with power law.

get_engine()

get_model([which_engine, with_alias])

get_pars(which[, with_alias])

More details about the fitting engines and models can be found at Models
